attributes.action: Implement an Animal Bill of Rights. A law that protects all species of animals.
attributes.background: It is currently legal to use, abuse, test on, eat, wear and murder animals. All animals deserve the basic rights to their lives and to not be objectified. We are not asking for better conditions, but instead a law giving back rights to non-human animals that have been stolen from them.
